content:
From: Jos√© Manuel Rodriguez Caballero <josephcmac@gmail.com>
Hello. Which library could be the best one to work with formal power
series, ignoring convergence issues and focusing in formal manipulations?

Also, I wonder is there is a formalization in Isabelle of the so-called
Pentagonal number theorem:
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pentagonal_number_theorem

Thank you in advance,
Jose M.
